```{r}
aus_accommodation

               values_to = "valor")

aus_accommodation_long |> 
  features(valor,
           list(media = mean,
                desv_std = sd,
                minimo = min,
                maximo = max,
                mediana = median)
           ) #|>

aus_accommodation_long
```
